CV7ContinuousBIT_System

Continuous Built-In Test flags for system information

Bits 0-31 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

CV7ContinuousBIT_System
CV7ContinuousBIT_System()
CV7ContinuousBIT_System
CV7ContinuousBIT_System(
uint32 bits
)
Parameters
bits
uint32

Value of bits 0-31 of the original 128 bit Continuous Built-In Test flags

RESPONSE_OFFSET

The offset of the 0 position of the value represented by this object in the overall BIT response Value: 0 bits

Bitmasks
GENERAL_FLAGS

0xFF000000 - Bitmask for general system flags (bits 0-7)

PROCESS_FLAGS

0x0000FF00 - Bitmask for system process flags (bits 16-23)

flags
uint32 flags() const

Gets the value of the system flags (bits 0-31)

Returns
uint32

Value of the system flags

general
CV7ContinuousBIT_System_General general() const

Gets information for general system flags (bits 0-7)

Returns
CV7ContinuousBIT_System_General

Information for general system flags

process
CV7ContinuousBIT_System_Process process() const

Gets information for system process flags (bits 16-23)

Returns
CV7ContinuousBIT_System_Process

Information for system process flags
